name: Embarrassed Shina-chan~ the Naked Wandering College Girl
name_original: Embarrassed Shina-chan~ the Naked Wandering College Girl
description:
Story


The invisible action game in the big city running naked in the exposed wandering department!
When I wake up in the morning, I find a naked female university student lying in the middle of the city.
On the second day of the party, "Shiina Hazuka" (18 years old), a first-year college student, woke up naked on the road.
Her moblie phone and wallet are gone, and all she can rely on is her own body...

If you are found in a conspicuous place, it will be publicized
If you are found in an inconspicuous place, you will be violated in various ways...

If the police find you, you will be arrested as a current offender and make headlines, making your future dark!
The 3D invisible action game that bets on the life of Shiina starts here ......



Game Feature

● Lovely 3D map
● The heroine who always remains naked
● Hiding from the surrounding eyes
● Invisible action game with desperate efforts
● Full voice of the heroine
● 8 types of endings
developers: かわいそうなのは抜ける
